00027 /* standard includes. */
00028 #include <stdio.h>
00029 #include <stdlib.h>
00030 #include <getopt.h>
00031 
00032 /* basic includes. */
00033 #include "gfs-defines.h"
00034 #include "gfs-typedefs.h"
00035 #include "gfs-options.h"
00036 
00037 /* function prototypes. */
00038 OPTIONS *parse_options (OPTIONS * cop, cint argc, char *argv[]);
00039 static OPTIONS *new_options (void);
00040 
00041 /* functions. */
00042 
00059 OPTIONS *
00060 parse_options (OPTIONS * cop, cint argc, char *argv[])
00061 {
00062   /* externs. */
00063 
00064   /* function externs. */
00065   extern char *estrdup (const char *);
00066   extern void print_usage (FILE *, cint);
00067   extern void print_version (FILE *, cint);
00068   extern void print_author (FILE *, cint);
00069   extern void print_license (FILE *, cint);
00070 
00071   /* next option in command line. */
00072   register int next_option;
00073 
00074   /* short options. */
00075   cstring short_options = "rmnie:v";
00076 
00077   /* long options. */
00078   const struct option long_options[] = {
00079     {"reverse-match", 0, NULL, 'r'},
00080     {"max-matches", 0, NULL, 'm'},
00081     {"line-number", 0, NULL, 'n'},
00082     {"ignore-case", 0, NULL, 'i'},
00083     {"pattern", 1, NULL, 'e'},
00084     {"verbose", 0, NULL, 'v'},
00085     {"copyleft", 0, NULL, 'c'},
00086     {"author", 0, NULL, 'a'},
00087     {"version", 0, NULL, 'V'},
00088     {"help", 0, NULL, 'h'},
00089     {"usage", 0, NULL, 'u'},
00090     {NULL, 0, NULL, 0}
00091   };
00092 
00093   /* create and initialize 
00094      options data structure. */
00095   cop = new_options ();
00096 
00097   /* start scanning. */
00098   do
00099     {
00100       /* get next option. */
00101       next_option =
00102         getopt_long (argc, argv, short_options, long_options, NULL);
00103 
00104       switch (next_option)
00105         {
00106           /* print usage and exit. */
00107         case 'h':
00108         case 'u':
00109           print_usage (stdout, EXIT_SUCCESS);
00110 
00111           /* print version and exit. */
00112         case 'V':
00113           print_version (stdout, EXIT_SUCCESS);
00114 
00115           /* print author and exit. */
00116         case 'a':
00117           print_author (stdout, EXIT_SUCCESS);
00118 
00119           /* print license and exit. */
00120         case 'c':
00121           print_license (stdout, EXIT_SUCCESS);
00122 
00123           /* invert the sence of matching. */
00124         case 'r':
00125           cop->reverse_match = true;
00126           break;
00127 
00128           /* show the max number of matches. */
00129         case 'm':
00130           cop->max_matches = true;
00131           break;
00132 
00133           /* show each line of output with the line number. */
00134         case 'n':
00135           cop->line_number = true;
00136           break;
00137 
00138           /* ignore case distinctions. */
00139         case 'i':
00140           cop->ignore_case = true;
00141           break;
00142 
00143           /* input matching pattern. */
00144         case 'e':
00145           cop->pattern = estrdup (optarg);
00146           break;
00147 
00148           /* explain what is being done. */
00149         case 'v':
00150           cop->verbose = true;
00151           break;
00152 
00153           /* unknown option. */
00154         case '?':
00155           print_usage (stderr, EXIT_ERROR);
00156 
00157           /* eop. */
00158         case -1:
00159           break;
00160 
00161         default:
00162           abort ();
00163         }
00164     }
00165   while (next_option != -1);
00166 
00167   /* return the options pointer. */
00168   return cop;
00169 }
00170 
00182 static OPTIONS *
00183 new_options (void)
00184 {
00185   /* externs. */
00186 
00187   /* function externs. */
00188   extern void *emalloc (size_t);
00189 
00190   OPTIONS *newp;
00191 
00192   /* allocate enough memory space. */
00193   newp = (OPTIONS *) emalloc (sizeof (OPTIONS));
00194 
00195   /* init options to a default state. */
00196   newp->verbose = false;
00197   newp->reverse_match = false;
00198   newp->max_matches = false;
00199   newp->line_number = false;
00200   newp->ignore_case = false;
00201   newp->pattern = NULL;
00202 
00203   /* return the options pointer. */
00204   return newp;
00205 }
